name: New Tech to Watch For
description: There are several new things coming soon. Stay on the look out to keep your technology up to date

name: When will the new iPhone release?
description: Rumors are still flying high on what to expect with the upcoming new iPhone release. What are you most looking for?

name: What do you think of autopilot?
description: Now that a few people have had a chance to test the coding autopilot, everyone is on their toes waiting for a full review. Will you use it once it releases to all?
